name: LD48: Madness in the Dark
description:
A Compo entry for Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper.Madness in the Dark

Navigate a ruined city while preserving your sanity. As you delve deeper and deeper into the collapsed layers of this city, the darkness and dread consume your mind. How much power can you claim from the artifacts within? How deep can you delve into the darkness? How much of your sanity are you willing to lose?
